resources.string: No backup have been created. To create a backup, click the \'CREATE BUTTON\' button
To backup or restore app data using Google Drive Please Sign In at you Google account:
Attention! The newly created backup will overwrite the existing one. Are you sure you want to create a new app data backup?
Attention! When restoring, all current application data will be overwritten. Continue?
Are you sure you want to delete app data backup?
Please note! To restore app data from another smartphone, you need to use the same Google account on both smartphones!
